name: A Cookie Tale
description:
A Cookie Tale is a story of...... actually, I don't even know how to describe it, really.

It's a comedic tale of a group of weirds: a humanized Oreo, a sentient plushie, a robot that was originally a toy, and a slime with anime hair going on an adventure! What type of adventure? .....Man, you tell me.

It is my first time doing a story based exploration game and making a comedic game this short might be good enough.

This game was made with RPG Maker MV and while the concept and some of the pixel art was made a long while ago (particularly the character sprites), everything else was done under a month (Yes, even the music.).

Special Thanks to TenshiHanka for giving me the extra push to finally work on this game!

(The Windows and Mac Versions are only uploaded. I will upload the rest soon. It was just taking forever, I'm sorry!! ;;.)
